entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-01-26
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • 赶快把还原到.Net6 版本的支持！！！！！！！！你们和他妈傻逼一样，老子用.Net6 写了项目上线正式环境，你们更新把.net6 强制移除了，必须更新.net8.老子他妈的项目，现在出问题了，打不开。换到.net8 打包好了，客户机器上又打不开。 #38285
  • [WebToolsE2E][Aspire] After installing .NET SDK 9.0, the 'microsoft.net.sdk.aspire' folder is not included by default and needs to be manually updated workload using CLI to appear. #38284
  • Warning: Workload garbage collection failed with error: Failed to remove Microsoft.Emscripten Error: 0x00000643. Fatal error during installation. #38280

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/9.0.1xx-preview1] Skip flaky tests #38307
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [`dotnet list package`]Resolve relative paths #38306
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix merged test asset folder #38305
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • [DO NOT MERGE] Installer merge main update reference #38304
    untriaged, Area-Workloads, DO NOT MERGE
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.3xx' => 'main' #38300
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • [Static web assets] Unskip test #38261
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Fix typo in StaticWebAsset.cs #34818
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Suppress vstest terminal logger via environment variable #38286
    Area-DotNet Test, untriaged

Updated

  • Use workload sets as per user request #37681
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Move `PackageOutputPath` initialization to NuGet's Pack targets #10733
    breaking-change, stale
  • [WIP] Check PublishSelfContained #37693
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [APICompat] Don't filter package assets and handle placeholder files #27822
    Area-ApiCompat, stale
  • [23250] - dotnet test boolean flags options fixed #27262
    Area-DotNet Test, stale
  • [25961] - dotnet watch first key press fix #26870
    area-System.Console, Area-Watch, stale
  • Make the ImplicitUsings feature minimally define each imported namespace #25225
    Area-NetSDK, stale
  • Replace rollForward in tools runtimeconfig #24817
    Area-Infrastructure, stale
  • Update param in CoreGenerateSatelliteAssemblies #24514
    Area-Compilers, stale
  • Add property builder helper #23730
    Area-Infrastructure, stale
  • Rename _EnableConsumingManagedCodeFromNativeHosting to EnableNativeHostActivation #23159
    Area-Infrastructure, stale
  • Adding `DotNetWatchBuild` variable to the msbuild initiated by dotnet-watch #21722
    Area-Watch, stale
  • Rocky Linux support #21029
    Area-Infrastructure, stale
  • New: Add the ability to run concurrent client connections #16048
    Area-Watch, stale
  • Workload history 3 #36809
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Allow for GenAPI to include additional API #38232
    untriaged, Area-GenAPI
  • [Issue #37501] Verbosity Options default to `minimal` from `quiet` #38277
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
